casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. LYLE EDWARD RICHARDSON, Appellant. (No. 71-1428-C) 496 P2d 932 Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause and filed the brief for appellant. John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With him on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Burgess, Special Assistant Attorney General, Salem. Before Langtry, Presiding Judge, and Foley and Fort, Judges.

Argued May 15,

affirmed May 15,1972
